name: Pigeon Magic witch match 3 saga - free puzzle game
name_original: Pigeon Magic witch match 3 saga - free puzzle game
description:
Play with the beautiful witch granny and blast all the colors bottles and potions explore a big world of exciting puzzles, you have to finish about 300 levels, use your brain and be smart to reach the top of the map and get the super Oscar.

If you think you are the smartest one on this world reach the last level ;) and beat it.

How to play :

- Try to match a minimum 3 of the potions with the same color, match more than 3 to unlock good blaster and special potions, to finish the level quickly and get the highest score.

- Use your intelligence and brain to perform the best combination to gain time and get the best score

Please give us your reviews on the game so we can ameliorate it, so you can get the best gaming experience with us

Have fun and thanks for playing.
